metadata.title: CVE-2016-6191 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the View Raw Sourcepage in the Web Calendar in SOGo before 3.1.3 allow remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) Description, (2) Location,(3) URL, or (4) Title field.

criterions.comment: sogo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
